title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: line type
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: circle type
content:
The

type="circle" is of the circle type. widthYou can adjust the width of the ring progress bar canvas. The default value is 126px.
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: Dashboard Type
content:
The

type="dashboard" is displayed as a dashboard. widthYou can adjust the width of the ring progress bar canvas. The default value is 126px.
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: Width
content:
Width of the

stroke-width progress bar, in px
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: Status
content:
Current status of the

status progress bar: (success/exception/warning)
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: Text displayed or not displayed
content: show-text Whether to display progress bar text
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: Custom Color
content: Set the color of the progress bar through color. color: background color of the progress bar (overwrites the status color)
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: Custom Text
content:
The

text-inside progress bar text is embedded in the progress bar (available only when type is set to line). formatCustomize the progress bar text
findIntroStr: Displays the operation progress and informs users of the current status and expectations.

title: Dynamic control progress bar change
content: Dynamic control of the progress bar by setting percentage
